sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zi bai dian feng 紫白癜風 , purple and white patches wind. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qie zi 茄子：燒灰，治口齒瘡䘌。生切，擦癜風 , “Burned to ashes it will cure dental sores from hidden worms. Cut fresh specimens finely and rub on the patches wind ”. Dian ji 顛疾 , peak ailment [1]

Pathological Condition affecting the head. Su wen 素問 47: 在母腹中時，其母有所大驚，氣上而不下， 精氣並居，故令子發為顛疾也 , “When [the fetus] is in the mother’s abdomen and the mother is extremely frightened, the qi rises and does not move down. It takes residence together with the essence qi. Hence, this makes the child develop peak-illness ”.
